channel.title: Surface Invaders - Ludum Dare 29
channel.description:
Now my Ludum Dare 29 game is practically finished. It's called Surface Invaders.
[img]http://martus.se/ld29/surface_invaders/Surface_Invaders.png[/img]
Shoot all surface invaders to get to the next round. If you hit, you will earn time. But if you miss, you will lose time. The more rounds you play without losing, the faster they will run. If your time runs out, you will lose.
You can read more about it and download it from here: http://martus.se/ld29/surface_invaders/

item.title: Surface Invaders - Ludum Dare 29
item.dc:creator: @Protosstribe object
item.description:
@Protosstribe wrote:

Thanks! Yes, the difficulty level increases a little bit too fast. I might update that at some point.

Read full topic
